name: Vegan Paella
description: This vegan paella with artichokes, smoked tofu, and sun-dried tomatoes feels like a vacation to spain! It's packed with flavor and it's perfect for summer!
recipeIngredient: 7 oz smoked tofu, cut into cubes
1  red bell pepper, cut into medium-sized chunks
1 medium zucchini, cut into medium pieces
about 8  sun-dried tomatoes in oil, cut into stripes
1 can artichoke hearts, drained and roughly chopped
3-5  cups vegetable broth (depending on what kind of rice you use, adjust if needed )

recipeInstructions.text: Heat some oil in a large pan and fry the smoked tofu cubes over medium heat until brown and crispy on all sides. Put aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat some oil in a large pan and fry the smoked tofu cubes over medium heat until brown and crispy on all sides. Put aside.

recipeInstructions.text: Heat some more oil in the same pan and sauté the onion and the garlic for about 2-3 minutes. Then add the red bell pepper and the zucchini and cook for another 3 minutes. Stir in the rice and cook about 2-3 more minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat some more oil in the same pan and sauté the onion and the garlic for about 2-3 minutes. Then add the red bell pepper and the zucchini and cook for another 3 minutes. Stir in the rice and cook about 2-3 more minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Deglaze with white wine. Season with salt, pepper, and paprika powder. Dissolve the saffron in 2 tablespoons of warm water and add to the pealla.
recipeInstructions.name: Deglaze with white wine. Season with salt, pepper, and paprika powder. Dissolve the saffron in 2 tablespoons of warm water and add to the pealla.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the vegetable broth (I recommend starting with 3 cups) and cook for about 15-20 minutes or until the rice is tender and has absorbed all the liquid. If necessary add more vegetable broth.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the vegetable broth (I recommend starting with 3 cups) and cook for about 15-20 minutes or until the rice is tender and has absorbed all the liquid. If necessary add more vegetable broth.

recipeInstructions.text: Once the rice is tender, stir in the cooked peas, the sun-dried tomatoes, the olives, the smoked tofu, and the artichokes. Cook for about 2 minutes or until heated through. Sprinkle with fresh parsley and serve with lemon slices.
recipeInstructions.name: Once the rice is tender, stir in the cooked peas, the sun-dried tomatoes, the olives, the smoked tofu, and the artichokes. Cook for about 2 minutes or until heated through. Sprinkle with fresh parsley and serve with lemon slices.
